H0.text: Mass of 372 g is a chemical property of a substance.

H1.text: The ability to react with HCl is a chemical property of a substance.

H2.text: Density of 37 g/cm³ is a chemical property of a substance.

H3.text: White powder with silver specks is a chemical property of a substance.

A4.text: A cup might have the physical properties of mass, shape, color, temperature, etc.

A5.text: Physical properties are contrasted with chemical properties which determine the way a material behaves in a chemical reaction.
